direction.raw_text: I just spoke to Bill Capa. This license plate might belong to our mystery lady. Close up on Anderson and Hector. Anderson gives to Hector the piece of paper Bill had given to him. Hector reads the paper.

direction.raw_text: Bill runs to the door of the house. He knocks repeatedly and forcefully.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mrs. Niedelmeyer ! It's Dr. Capa again. Edith Niedelmeyer opens the small panel in the door. She looks furious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You leave me alone ! Get away from here !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I need your help, please !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why are you torturing me like this ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mrs. Niedelmeyer, please !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Edith closes the small panel. Several heavy blows on the door, which eventually crashes open and gives access to Bill. The house is very heavily decorated.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I need you to listen to me ! My best friend was killed. He was stabbed with a knife...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You get out of my house !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ... 38 times in the chest !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You-You go away!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He follows her through the sitting room. They arrive near a bay window, behind which we can see a large swimming pool. Another patient was bled to death ! I think that I might be next !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go away !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't have anywhere else to go, Mrs. Niedelmeyer ! What are you hiding from me ? What is it ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why won't you tell me the truth ? Edith picks up a cordless phone on a table. Bill tears the phone away from her hands. Put that phone down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm calling the police !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Put the phone down ! Put the phone down !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She falls on the armchair in which Bill has pushed her. Please ! What kind of twisted creature are you ? I've never done anything to you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My patient Richie is involved...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why in God's name are you doing this horrible joke ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you just help me...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Richie Dexter is dead ! He killed himself four years ago.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because he couldn't stand... what my husband was doing to him. She gets up goes to the window bay and open a glass door. She leans against the frame of the door. He hung himself with a belt. He was 12. I didn't know ! I mean, how could I know ? Nobody knew.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What about the family ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He is survived by his brother, Dale. If Richie Dexter were alive today... he'd be 16 years old. He also had a sister, Rose. Bill stands still for a few seconds. He has just understood the truth. Then he sighs and rushes out of the house. He runs near a impressive mantlepiece decorated with a fierce lion head pulling its tongue out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - PARKING - EXTERIOR NIGHT Bob's car arrives on the empty parking lot in front of Dale's workshop. The atmosphere is even more uncomfortable at night than during the day. Lightnings in the sky. There are lights evenly placed all along the high chimney. Several windows are lit on the first floor of the building. Bill parks the car in front of the building, gets out the car and runs toward the building. He enters using the door with the sign Beware of dog.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - LIVING QUARTERS - INTERIOR NIGHT Bill gets in the living quarters of the Dexter. It is quite dark. In one corner, a large kitsch statue of Christ of the Sacred Heart. A sink with two cabinets with glass doors.. Bill pushes the sliding door leading to the workshop.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - WORKSHOP - INTERIOR NIGHT Bill walks between statues being worked on. He bumps into a small cage hanging from the ceiling. He opens a door which leads him into a small room covered with spiderwebs. Something liquid drops on his hand. It's blood. Bill raises his head. Though a gate in the ceiling, he sees the crying face of Richie. He gets out of the small room, takes a big piece of carved wood on a table, and climbs the steps leading to the upper parts of the workshop. When he arrives in the upper gallery, he menacingly waves the piece of wood, and walks very cautiously. Richie is seated with his back to him. He has blood on his T-shirt.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Richie. He gets nearer and puts the piece of wood down. Jesus Christ ! When he is close to Richie, he sees that his T-shirt is badly torn down and full of blood. He wants to touch it, but Richie starts moaning. Bill kneels near him. What did he... What did he do to you ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He can hardly talk, and stammers even more than usual. W-What I... d-deserved. Y-You shouldn't be here. Get away from me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Richie... Richie... I have to see Rose. He takes off Richie's glasses. I need her. He takes off Richie's wig, and Rose's face appears.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She has gone back to Rose's voice, and doesn't stammer anymore. Get away from me, please ! You'll make it worse !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where's Dale ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She cries.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: don't know, but he'll be back ! L-I don't know where he is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He is also crying. Was this your idea, to become Richie ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No ! No ! L-It happened. It just happened.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What? What happened, Rose ? Please. I need to know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When Richie died... Dale buried the body and then he said, "Richie, come here." And I told him, I told him, "My name is Rose !" He slapped me so hard, I couldn't get up. A-And he, he made me dress in these clothes... and h-he did things to me that made me not want to be a woman anymore. I was Richie from then on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What happened to Rose ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: After a while, I forgot about Rose. Then Richie got busted.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And you had to come to group.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They were our world. They were our family.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But then what ? Rose started coming back ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No! Rose, Rose was too scared, so Bonnie came out. Bonnie was first.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, honey.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Help me, please ! Help me. Rose moves her eyes down and Bill follows her eyes. He discovers that Rose's hand has been nailed to the carved armrest of the armchair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jesus! Oh, my God ! Bill stands up. Oh! Jesus Christ ! Jesus Christ ! He goes to the table where he had dropped the piece of wood and start looking for an appropriate tool. He finds a big hammer. That crazy bastard ! With the forked end of the hammer, he raises the nail.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She cries and yells. Oh, God ! Bill gets the nail off. Rose can't breathe anymore. Her eyes are rolling upwards.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He feels that she is going away from him. Rose !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She goes back to Richie's voice and face. She starts stammering again. Get away f-from me!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rose, come back ! Richie ! Richie, leave her alone !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Still talking like Richie. I never get to be out a-anymore.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rose. Come on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rose's head stands up : she is gone back being Rose. And then I met you and the fog... Started to lift. Bill takes off the other nail. It did. It did.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know. Come on, let's go. He helps her to stand up, and then to walk. Let's go. Here we go. Come on. Shh. Come here. They start going down to the workshop. Here we go. Here we go. Let's move. We hear the sound of a nail-gun, and a nail clicks on a piece of metal near them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh ! Several nail-gun shots. Nails are getting stuck in the various wooden objects around them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shot from behind Dale. He holds a nail-gun and keeps on shooting nails. Back up! He sticks a nail in Bill's shirt. Bill remains nailed against a carved wooden panel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She yells and holds Bill tightly. No ! No, Dale, don't !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get back ! Get back !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dale, no !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Quick tongue, slow wit. Deadly, Doctor. Bill tries to take the nail off. The nail must have gone through his flesh, because there is blood on his shirt. Deadly. Dale raises his nail-gun slowly, but Hector appears from behind a wall, holding a real gun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hi, Dale. You fucking daffodil. Put that toy down. Put it in the toolbox. Now ! I got .45 caliber nails in this gun !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you doing here, Martinez ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He talks to Bill who is behind him, but without taking his eyes away from Dale. Aren't you glad I'm here ? Anderson snitched you out ! That's what happens when you try to outsmart a cop ! Let that be your psych lesson for the day ! At the end of his sentence, Hector slightly turns his head toward Bill. Immediately Dale shoots him. Hector bends down a little because of the pain, and stands back up to shoot Dale. But Dale is faster than him and nails both of his hands against the wood panel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He yells. Go ! Run !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go ! Get over there ! Get over there !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No ! No ! Dale keeps on shooting and sticks several nails in Hector's fingers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Go ! Run ! Run ! Run ! Run ! Go ! Bill succeeds in getting the nail off his arm. He runs away with Rose. We follows them through the workshop. As they reach a staircase, we hear an engine starting. Then a whole block of shelves falls in front of them. We see Dale in a small glass cabin, his hands on the controls of a handling machine. Bill moves Rose away from him...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's go! ... just as a huge piece of furniture falls on Bill, who falls down, stuck under the furniture.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No ! Get out ! Dale appears behind Bill, and wraps a leather belt around his neck. He tightens the belt. Bill suffocates. Dale pulls him by the belt across the workshop.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on ! Come on ! He puts him inside a metal cage. He ties the belt on the top of the cage. Bill tries, with both hands to move the belt away from his throat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You fucking son of a bitch ! Dale takes a small electric saw, switches it on and tests it on the bars of the cage. Sparks spring up. You really fucked it up, didn't ya ? Got your little brother killed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You let old Niedelmeyer do it to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I saved him !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You knew what was happening...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't know !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because it happened to you before !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Would you goddamn shut up ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Could have saved your little brother, but he killed himself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He is getting angry. Shut up ! Shut the fuck up !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You failed, Dale. And you made Rose become Richie !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He calms down and smiles. Oh, you're smart. You're really smart. Bob Moore was smart, but I put a stop to that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, you did. He coughs. Why'd you kill Casey, Dale?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why are you head-shrinkers all alike, huh ? Y-You can't keep your fucking hands off of us. Huh ? Always pokin' and pushin'. Huh ? While talking, he keeps on switching his saw on and off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why'd you do it, Dale ?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because... that little bitch, Rose, she started sneaking out... playing like Bonnie, modeling for him night after night. Christ, Bill, he was lookin' right through her... gonna recognize Richie in group. Well, I might have missed old Niedelmeyer... but I sure as hell got Bob... real good. - And now... He starts his saw. Sparks spring up on the edge of the cage. I'm gonna cut you into little pieces and sand the skin off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He snickers. The inspiration of madness, Dale.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The tyranny of normalcy, Bill. He starts his saw again, and slowly moves it close to Bill. We hear the sound of the nail-gun and a nail gets stuck in Dale's shoulder. The saw stops. Dale walks back a few steps to face Rose, holding the nail-gun pointed on him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Richie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My name is... My name is Rose. He rushes on her. She shoots and sticks a nail in the middle of his forehead. Dale falls down. Rose starts screaming. No ! No ! Bill tries to get the belt off his neck. Rose raises the gun to her throat, and presses the trigger. But it doesn't work. She tries again. It still doesn't work. The gun must be empty. No ! Bill eventually succeeds in getting free, but Rose, after she has thrown the gun away, starts running through the workshop. No !
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He runs after her. Rose ! Rose ! Come back ! Rose !
direction.name: direction
